h2_title: The Mad Tiger in the Well
content: There's a whole family of tigers to meet in Chapter 2, and one of them is the Mad Tiger, which you can find in a well near Sandgate Village. To uncover the well, you'll need to start off by finding and fighting Tiger's Acolyte in Windgate Village. He'll drop an Old Rattle-Drum which you can use in three spots across the chapter to uncover its secret. Once you've found all three and used the drum, a well will be revealed near Sandgate Village. Drop down into it and go head-to-head with the Mad Tiger.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Secrets_in_Black_Myth_Wukong.md', within the main section titled 'Chapter 2 Secrets', specifically from the subsection 'The Mad Tiger in the Well'.
The content is as follows:
There's a whole family of tigers to meet in Chapter 2, and one of them is the Mad Tiger, which you can find in a well near Sandgate Village. To uncover the well, you'll need to start off by finding and fighting Tiger's Acolyte in Windgate Village. He'll drop an Old Rattle-Drum which you can use in three spots across the chapter to uncover its secret. Once you've found all three and used the drum, a well will be revealed near Sandgate Village. Drop down into it and go head-to-head with the Mad Tiger.
